# Theme 
 
The current theme of the application can be set using the code block below. 
 
```yaml 
font: 'Roboto', sans-serif 
codeFont: 'Fira Code', 'Roboto Mono', monospace 
background: #000 
foreground: #fff 
codeBackground: #000 
codeForeground: #fff 
quoteBackground: #000 
quoteForeground: #fff \caccent: #00b0ff 
```
